email.title: IC HACK IS BACK!
email.text: **IC Hack** is back bigger than ever for its eighth consecutive year! **IC Hack 19** will take place on **26-27th January** at the Imperial College London South Kensington campus with over 400 participants!

We will be releasing tickets in two ticket batches:
- **Batch 1**: Thursday 3rd January 12:00pm GMT - **Batch 2**: Thursday 10th January 1:30pm GMT
Tickets will be available at this link: https://ichack19.eventbrite.com/. Be punctual as tickets sold out in **less than a minute** last year!
Both general and Imperial College student tickets will be available. You must be **over 18** on the date of the event to attend due to legal/venue requirements.
**Please note**: If you are signing up for an Imperial student ticket, you must register with your @ic.ac.uk/@imperial.ac.uk email address. If you have just graduated from Imperial College, you are eligible to claim a student ticket.
Be sure to follow our **Facebook event** [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/2239401369677547/) to stay up to date with more information.
We look forward to seeing you at IC Hack 19 and hope you have a great start to the new year!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
